CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 23, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Never Missed! Mrs. Mary Brandon, 73, of 39 Fullerton Street, is shown being helped from the Connolley Trade School polling place by James Hayes. Mrs. Brandon is proud of her record of having voted in every election since the advent of women's suffrage. Looking on are a few political workers, Mickey McElroy, Bud Addissey, Levi Macklin. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mary Brandon being escorted by James Hayes out of Eighth District polling place in Connelley Trade School, with Mickey McElroy, Bud Addissey, and Levi Macklin in background
